item.title: Teleports, range and npcs
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Alright for teleports, click on it and if in the cmd box you see

case 185 actionbutton (about 3-5 numbers here) those 3-5 numbers are the button you would use to make that buton work. This is also how you can make new emote tab buttons work, and such

item.title: Teleports, range and npcs
item.dc:creator: @robocz033 robocz033
item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

3 things.

  1. my range targets arent giving xp, ne help?
  2. my teles dont workâ€¦
  3. ik how to spawn npcs and make em talk, but i put in the codes
    npc handler code:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1199) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to Trampscape!"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1183) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Tramposch")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Trampsch is ONLINE"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Tramposch is OFFLINE"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1184) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Altec")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Altec is ONLINE"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Altec is OFFLINE"; } }
npc spawn:

spawn = 1184 3256 3430 0 0 0 0 0 1 elf spawn = 1183 3554 3430 0 0 0 0 0 1 elf spawn = 1199 3552 3430 0 0 0 0 0 1 elf spawn = 1199 3550 3430 0 0 0 0 0 1 elf
and idk bout the range and teles.

ne help?
